title: Book, change and cancel theory tests for your pupils

details.overview: Book and manage car, motorcycle, lorry, bus and Driver Certificate of Professional Competence theory tests for your pupils
details.more_information:
You’ll also need the following from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA):

- business ID
- username
- password

You can book test slots up to 3 months in advance. You won’t have to give the candidate’s details when you book the tests.

% You must confirm the details of the candidate taking the test by 4pm a full working day before the test, eg by 4pm on Wednesday if the test is on Friday. %

^ Sundays and public holidays are not counted as working days. ^

##Cancel or change a test

You must give at least 3 clear working days notice when cancelling or changing a test to get a refund.

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.

^ There's a different process to follow to [book, change and cancel theory tests](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/theory-test "Book, change and cancel theory tests"){:rel="external"} in Northern Ireland. ^

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
